comments:
Hi:

I installed the following file: wtp-all-in-one-sdk-R-1.5.1-200609230508-win32.zip.

I never had a problem with Eclipse, but after the install, I can no longer save files in Eclipse.  The error in the eclipse log is below.

Thank you for any help you can offer.

Regards,
Harvey

Here is the stack trace:

Created an attachment (id=53108)
scnshot when exiting eclipse

I also get this error when exiting eclipse, apparently trying to save its settings and cannot.

My guess is you either got a partial downloaded zip, or, you did not install into a completely fresh directory. Try both, re-downloading, and re-unzipping into a completely fresh directory. If you still get the error, you'll have to tell us more ... about vm used? system? and, you could attach your "configuration" here. 
(Its available from the "about" box. It'll give you a whole list of stuff you can save in anohter file, and attach here.

putting in remind state to signify we are waiting for information. 

Please re-open once you re-try, know more, or can attach your configuration and error logs.
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
Reopening, as resolved bugs in the remind state should not have been automatically closed.
Putting back to the resolved->remind state.
